phrs.translation: 脉冲式分泌, 脉冲分泌
脉冲释药系统, 脉冲给药系统
血液脉动流, 脉动性血流
搏动指数, 动指数, 和搏动指数, 脉动指数

sentences.sentence: Surprisingly, pulsatile motion can help heal injuries in situ too.
sentences.translation: 令人惊讶的是，脉动式的动作也有助于伤口愈合。

sentences.sentence: Pulsatile tinnitus has various etiologies, including atherosclerotic carotid artery disease.
sentences.translation: 引起脉动性耳鸣的病因很多，其中包含颈动脉血管的粥状硬化。

sentences.sentence: We present a woman who had been bothered by pulsatile tinnitus of the right ear which resulted from carotid artery stenosis.
sentences.translation: 我们报告一例因为颈动脉血管粥状硬化，导致其右耳脉动性耳鸣。
